website_summaries.verdict: STP’s high-end brake fluid goes a long way towards getting the best performance possible from your brake system, and is an excellent long term investment.
pros: Protects against brake failure due to vapor lock
Intended for disc or drum brake systems
cons: STP is a little on the pricy side, but it is a premium brake formula drivers have trusted for decades

customer_reviews.title: Came without a lid
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came without a cap. I had other items shipped to me in the same box, including clothes. The bottle came sealed, but without a cap. I checked the box, trying to see if it just fell off. Nope, it was shipped that way. If the seal leaked, that would've been a disaster, not just for myself but for other customers as well, since break fluid is very toxic and very corrosive. Now I have a half-empty bottle with volatile chemical, for which I have to improvise a lid. Pretty disappointed with packing services. As for the product, it was decent and did what it supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy B.

customer_reviews.title: My car stopped.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my cars brake fluid reservoir. I then proceeded to drive my car. I applied the brakes. My car stopped. I drove on a little further, applied the brakes again, and again my car stopped. I repeated the process countless times, including on local roads and highways, with the same results. So, I guess it works.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - difficult to find anywhere else but Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be very difficut to find Dot 3 "heavy duty" brake fluid in my area that is NOT synthetic. Why that is, I have no clue. Thankfully Amazon carries the non-synthetic stuff, which is exactly what my vintage car needs. Got it at an excellent price and delivery was the next day. How can you beat that? Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Share-A-Smile

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This does the job exactly as needed. I had more than enough to refill the brake system on my 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited after I did a lift which require do longer brake lines. I’m not sure of any long term issues that may happen, but if your situation is similar to mine then you can be certain this product will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: It's break fluid
customer_reviews.text: If your automobile needs DOT 3 break fluid this is one of many brands that will do the job. I used to do a complete break job on my 2006 Saturn Vue. Front, rear, wheel cylinders, and master cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good product and priced affordably
customer_reviews.text: It is getting increasingly more difficult to find non silicon DOT 3 fluid for those of us who still tinker with 50 year old cars. When you do find it locally it is usually in very small bottles at high prices, making its cost per ounce prohibitive. A 32 ounce bottle of a product by a known manufacturer is very welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerman

customer_reviews.title: Price HIGH but...
customer_reviews.text: Wonder which republican-type manipulation? has caused price of THIS to TRIPLE- QUADRIPLE over a year ago?? ...no joke, 'thought it was a misprint. Shipping, psckaging, speed, all great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hitchens RIP

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE
customer_reviews.text: DID WHAT IT WAS SUPPOSED TO DO AND AMAZON HAD THE BEST PRICE. MATCHED IT UP WITH MOTIVE BRAKE BLEEDING EQUIPMENT THROUGH AMAZON AND IT DID THE JOB .
customer_reviews.author: j ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: use it for the steering motor on my portable submarine i am building in my garage
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Worth getting from Amazon if you don't need it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was as listed but IT SHIPPED WITHOUT A LID
customer_reviews.text: The brake fluid was perfect but, as other reviews have mentioned, this highly corrosive chemical that's dangerous to even human skin was shipped with only a thin foil seal and the lid appears to have been removed. I can only imagine what would happen if this had spilled in the back of a delivery truck.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Honda Fit
customer_reviews.text: Used in 2015 Honda Fit EX to bleed brake lines and fill with new brake fluid. Large bottle - after brake job even had some left over.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Missing cap
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine and works well. However, the item was shipped without a cap. I'm thankful the seal was enough to keep it from leaking during shipping. It is inconvenient not having a top/cap to put on the bottle since I didn't use all of it at once.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you bleed you brakes regularly
customer_reviews.text: My truck still stops after a brake job and replacement brake fluid. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Thanks for not answering the question

customer_reviews.title: Standard for brake fluid
customer_reviews.text: The standard for brake fluid. Arrived in good shape, no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: It's DOT3 Fluid... It works great
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how you can screw up hydraulic oil, and they didn't. Average price, free shipping with Amazon Prime. Works as it should. I used it in my Honda Prelude's clutch line and it works fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: 2K1Toaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't died from brake failure yet, so it works, I guess
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: STP  Great brake fluid at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to change my brakes and STP Brake Fluid played an important part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality fluid
customer_reviews.text: This came with a lot of moisture in the fluid. As soon as i opened it i tested the water content and it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Annoman Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good fluid for old car
customer_reviews.text: Good fluid! Put it in my antique car and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Bernie K.

customer_reviews.title: Just Brake Fluid
customer_reviews.text: It's brake fluid , nothing but brake fluid so I can get my brakes bleeding done , arrived faster than what it stated but that's fine with me ! Won't be doing brake work in the dark at least !
customer_reviews.author: HVAC TECHNICIAN

product_meta.title: STP Heavy Duty Brake Fluid for DOT 3, 32 Fl Oz, Pack of 1, 18668
product_meta.description: Style:DOT 3 (32 Oz)STP Heavy Duty Brake Fluid DOT 3 is specially formulated to coax optimum performance out of disc or drum brake systems in today’s cars and trucks. Protects brake system—for DOT3 ABS disc or drum brakes.
feature_bullets: Protects DOT 3 ABS disc or drum brake systems
Helps provide protection against brake failure from vapor lock
Helps prevent corrosion in brake system
Works with all brake systems requiring DOT 3 fluids
Exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety standard No. 116 and meets SAE spec. J1703

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
